alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 4:46AM AKST until January 14 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibilities reduced to a half-mile at times. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta Coast north of Kipnuk including Nunivak Island. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 5 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lowest visibilities are expected this evening into the overnight hours tonight. Conditions should begin to improve early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
